Yes, probably the best call Jim. My first shot kantei is always a bity 
off=
 :-), I shoudl ahve looked a bity longer. The seppa dai also is a 
little m=
ore narrow than Chosh=FB.

I just saw Ken's post and many Chosh=FB works ha=
s inlay. it was quite 
common. When I get a moment, I will cite some exampl=
es.

Rich
